name: COSLUS C51C30 Electric Toothbrush with Water Flosser Combo: Portable Oral Clean Kit for Teeth Brushing & Flossing, Multiple Modes for Multiple Users, Cordless for Home & Travel Use, Pink
short_description: Professional Dual Cleaning 2-in-1 Oral Care Combo: Engineered after 3 years of dedicated development by the COSLUS research team.​ The COSLUS C51C30 sonic electric toothbrush uses 41,000 VPM to remove plaque for brighter teeth in 2 weeks. The water flosser’s 30–140 PSI adjustable pressure cleans between teeth and protects gums. Together, they deliver a complete clean for a fresher mouth and a confident smile every day

Upgraded Portability for Home and Travel:​ Featuring a compact size and lightweight design, the COSLUS C51C30 cordless 2-in-1 combo is easy to carry anywhere. The water flosser features a clever water tank that stores 2 nozzles inside, which means you're keeping them organized and dry. The electric toothbrush comes with 2 protective caps, which means no extra cases are needed. The entire set fits neatly into your travel bag, making complete oral care effortless anywhere

Personalized Modes for Everyone, From Children to Seniors​: The COSLUS C51C30 water flosser features 3 specialized modes, while the sonic toothbrush offers 5 cleaning modes to suit different oral care needs. From gentle gum massage to deep interdental cleaning, each setting is designed to be powerful yet gentle. Whether for sensitive gums, braces, or daily maintenance, this combo provides tailored cleaning that adapts to all ages and sensitivities

More Durable, Performance You Can Trust​: Built with quality materials and precision engineering, this electric toothbrush and water flosser combo is more durable. The IPX7 waterproof rating allows for easy shower use and full-body rinsing. This oral cleaning kit is built to last up to 3 years with typical use​

The Complete Oral Clean Set for Your Family​: Designed for fully family's use, the water flosser and toothbrush combo includes 4 brush heads—2 for gentle cleaning and 2 for deep interdental cleaning—along with 4 nozzles to meet needs from daily care to orthodontic cleaning and fresh breath maintenance. This kit helps every household member maintain a consistent oral care routine for healthier, more confident smiles

name: Sonic Electric Toothbrush for Adults, USB Rechargeable Sonic Toothbrush with 8 Brush Heads, Smart Timer, 5 Modes, 2-Hour Fast Charge Last 30 Days, Pink
short_description: 【2 Minutes Smart Timer】: The 2 Minutes Intelligent Timer offers an interval pause every 30 seconds to remind you to balance the four areas of your mouth and to reach dental professional recommended brushing time and habit. IPX7 waterproof for easy water rinsing after each use.

【8 Brush Heads】: The bristles are made with dupont nylon which are soft, wear-resistant and non-absorbent, provide you a safe and gentle brushing experience. W-wave brush heads perfectly fit each tooth and better remove stains.

【Efficient Oral Care】: This electric toothbrush for adults employs a powerful motor to achieve 31,000 vibrations per minute to help you keep a consistent and effective clean of your teeth and gums. Remove more plaque and stains compared to a regular manual toothbrush, improve gum health better than a manual toothbrush.

【Hidden Charging Cable & Ergonomic Hand Grip】: The electric toothbrush is equipped with a hidden USB charging cable at the bottom of the toothbrush body, convenient to charge for all kind of charge block and avoid lost. Ergonomic hand grip is comfortable and non-slip. Fast charge Up to 30 days use (2 min/2x a day) on a full and fast charge of 2-hour.

【5 Optional Modes】: Customized brushing experience with 5 modes based on your specific needs: Clean mode, Polish mode, Milder mode, White mode, Massage mode. 5 different modes fit for different conditions of teeth and gums and even take full care of your sensitive oral and teeth.

name: Oral-B Pro 1000 Rechargeable Electric Toothbrush, Black
short_description: REMOVE UP TO 100% MORE PLAQUE* along the gumline whilst PROTECTING GUMS with our dentist-inspired round brush head technology *vs. a manual toothbrush
PROTECT YOUR GUMS with sensi cleaning mode and GUM PRESSURE CONTROL that automatically stops brush pulsations when brushing too hard
MAXIMIZE CLEANING performance with 3 EASY-TO-USE CLEANING MODES + handle-integrated quadrant timer that alerts you every 30sec to change brushing zone
PERSONALIZE & LEVEL-UP YOUR CLEAN with Oral-B BRUSH HEADS AVAILABLE* for YOUR individual needs: e.g., deep clean, gentle clean, whitening *for purchase
Oral-B ROUND brush heads REACH WHERE RECTANGULAR manual brushes DON'T. Experience a better clean from the #1 brand most used by dentists worldwide
Benefit from a RELIABLE LONG-LASTING BATTERY with LED charge indicator that SIGNALS WHEN YOU NEED TO CHARGE
Switch to Oral-B electric toothbrushes carefree. We OFFER 30-DAY MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE.
product_description: Product Description The Oral-B Pro 1000 rechargeable electric toothbrush provides a clinically proven superior deep clean in hard-to-reach areas vs. a regular manual toothbrush. 300% MORE plaque removal along the gumline versus a regular manual toothbrush. The professionally inspired design of the CrossAction brush head surrounds each tooth with bristles angled at 16 degrees. The Oral-B Pro 1000 has 3D cleaning action that oscillates, rotates, and pulsates to break up and remove plaque along the gumline than a regular manual toothbrush. The pressure sensor stops pulsations if you brush too hard to prevent harmful over-brushing and there are 3 modes. The toothbrush also includes an in-handle timer to help you brush for a dentist-recommended two minutes. Best of all, it is brought to you by Oral-B - the #1 brand used by dentists worldwide.* *Based on surveys of a representative worldwide sample of dentists carried out for P&G regularly. Do not use on children under age 3. Replace brush (head) every 3 months or sooner if brush head becomes worn. Manufacturer Contact Information P&G Plaza, Cincinnati, OH 45202

product_description: The iO is Oral-B’s best technology: Clinically Proven 400% More Plaque Removal Along Gumline versus a regular manual toothbrush. A Round head and gentle micro-vibrations, the Magnetic interaction delivers smooth, harmonious motion through a Synchronized cleaning action (micro-vibrations synced with oscillations). A Built-in-2-Minute Timer ensures an even easier experience, helping you get an optimal clean on all your teeth. The Oral-B's quadrant timer breaks the two minutes up into four 30-second intervals to clean each quadrant of your mouth; we keep the time, so you don’t have to. Delivering the perfect pressure is done by having a Pressure Sensor. The Pressure Sensor Indicates optimal cleaning pressure and warns of over pressure. With an accompanying travel case, you’ll have a fresh clean everywhere you go. We’re with you on your next trip or even your mid-day on-the go brushing! name: Oral-B iO Series 9 Limited Rechargeable Black Electric Toothbrush with (2) Ultimate Clean and (1) Gentle Care Replacement Brush Heads, Black, Travel Case and Charger
short_description: You will receive one (1) Oral-B iO9 Limited Electric Toothbrush, two (2) Ultimate Clean Replacement Brush Heads, one (1) Gentle Care Replacement Brush Head, one (1) travel case and one (1) Charger
The new iO Sense smart charger provides personalized live coaching to cover all 6 brushing zones
Experience a professional clean feeling with micro-vibrating bristles
Smart pressure sensor that lights up when you are brushing too hard
Interactive color display for brushing updates
7 smart settings for your brushing needs: Smart Adapt, Daily Clean, Sensitive, Whitening, Gum Care, Intense, and Tongue Clean,
Oral-B: Trust the brush dentists use the most worldwide
product_description: Discover the most advanced technology in the iO series yet. This Oral-B iO Series 9 Limited Electric Toothbrush comes with the iO Sense™, a smart charger that personalizes your brushing experience with real-time feedback. The in-handle interactive color display makes it easier to select a brushing mode, lets you know if you are brushing correctly, and informs you when brush heads need to be replaced to continue to get the best cleaning results. The dentist-inspired round brush head is combined with the power of micro-vibrating bristles to provide you with a complete, purifying clean. Oral-B iO Series 9 Limited Electric Toothbrush comes with live coaching that recognizes your brushing style and makes sure you are brushing across all 6 zones of your mouth, giving you a professional clean feeling and gum care like never before. This Electric Toothbrush helps you protect your gums with its pressure sensor that alerts you when you are brushing too hard or too softly, so you can get your best clean with the right amount of pressure. With the Oral-B iO 9 Limited Electric Toothbrush you can take care of your specific needs with its 7 smart brushing settings that include Smart Adapt, Daily Clean, Sensitive, Whitening Gum Care, Intense, and Tongue Clean. Sync your iO Electric Toothbrush with the free Oral-B app to create long-term goals that will help you achieve a healthier smile. Do not use on children under age 3. Replace brush head every 3 months or sooner if brush head becomes worn. Oral-B—the #1 brand used by dentists worldwide. *Based on surveys of a representative worldwide sample of dentists carried out for P&G regularly.

product_description: The Oral-B SMART 5000 Power Rechargeable Electric Toothbrush with Bluetooth Connectivity features a CrossAction brush head with bristles that reach deep between teeth for healthier gums.* Bluetooth communication allows the brush to connect with your smartphone to give you real-time feedback on your brushing habits and create a dental care journey based on your oral health goals. The Visible Pressure Sensor on the brush lights up to tell you when you apply too much pressure to your teeth and gums to help prevent harmful over-brushing. The toothbrush features 5 cleaning modes and a timer to help you brush for a dentist recommended 2 minutes. Oral-B SMART 5000 is compatible with a variety of replacement toothbrush heads and includes a convenient travel toothbrush holder. *vs a regular manual toothbrush Trust in the precision engineering of Braun and the dental expertise of Oral-B, the #1 brand used and recommended by dentists worldwide. 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed.
